content.raw: Where does the default --varFloor of 0.001 come from? This assumes asinh normalization? Should this be computed based on the minimum variance found between tracks instead? What if an input track is all peaks? @mlibbrecht can you help answer this or if @rcwchan if you know please put the answer here.
